summary: Fixed Livewire multiple root elements error by removing whitespace after @endphp in home.blade.php and component files (career-paths, super-app, popular-courses). All comments moved inside the root div element. Cache cleared but error persists - need further investigation.
current_status: Working on resolving Livewire MultipleRootElementsDetectedException. Fixed whitespace issues in main component and child components. Error still present - may need to check for additional root elements or use fragment wrapper.
